name: Scheming Minister
ability: On your first night choose a player. If they die by execution first you turn evil and vise versa.
firstNightReminder: Wake the scheming minister and let them choose a player. Place the 'No mutual Heaven' token next to them.
otherNightReminder: If either the scheming minister or the player marked with the token 'No mutual Heaven' dies by execution first, wake up the other and tell them they are evil.

name: Menace
ability: When you get die one of your alive neighbours may die tonight.
otherNightReminder: If the menace died tonight or today: A living neighbour may die, mark them with the 'Dies tonight' token.

name: Yin-Yang Master
ability: You start knowing two good and two evil characters. Amongst those exactly two must be in play.
firstNightReminder: Wake the Yin-Yang Master and show them two good and two evil characters, exactly two of which must be play.
